name: Dai Stablecoin
description: DAI is an Ethereum-based stablecoin whose issuance and development is managed by the Maker Protocol and MakerDAO. The price of DAI is soft-pegged to the U.S. dollar and is collateralized by a mix of other cryptocurrencies that are deposited into smart-contract vaults every time new DAI is minted.

en.description: DAI is an Ethereum-based stablecoin whose issuance and development is managed by the Maker Protocol and MakerDAO. The price of DAI is soft-pegged to the U.S. dollar and is collateralized by a mix of other cryptocurrencies that are deposited into smart-contract vaults every time new DAI is minted.

fr.description: DAI is an Ethereum-based stablecoin whose issuance and development is managed by the Maker Protocol and MakerDAO. The price of DAI is soft-pegged to the U.S. dollar and is collateralized by a mix of other cryptocurrencies that are deposited into smart-contract vaults every time new DAI is minted.

es.description: DAI es una moneda estable basada en Ethereum cuya emisión y desarrollo están gestionados por Maker Protocol y MakerDAO. El precio de DAI está vinculado al dólar estadounidense y está garantizado por una combinación de otras criptomonedas que se depositan en vaults de contratos inteligentes cada vez que se acuña un nuevo DAI.

de.description: DAI is an Ethereum-based stablecoin whose issuance and development is managed by the Maker Protocol and MakerDAO. The price of DAI is soft-pegged to the U.S. dollar and is collateralized by a mix of other cryptocurrencies that are deposited into smart-contract vaults every time new DAI is minted.

The price of DAI is soft-pegged to the U.S. dollar and is collateralized by a mix of other cryptocurrencies that are deposited into smart-contract vaults every time new DAI is minted.

The price of DAI is soft-pegged to the U.S. dollar and is collateralized by a mix of other cryptocurrencies that are deposited into smart-contract vaults every time new DAI is minted.

tr.description: DAI, verilmesi ve geliştirilmesi Maker Protocol ve MakerDAO tarafından yönetilen Ethereum tabanlı bir stabilcoindir. DAI'nin fiyatı ABD dolarına yumuşak bir şekilde sabitlenir ve her yeni DAI basıldığında akıllı sözleşme kasalarına yatırılan diğer kripto para birimlerinin bir karışımı ile teminat altına alınır.

vi.description: DAI is an Ethereum-based stablecoin whose issuance and development is managed by the Maker Protocol and MakerDAO. The price of DAI is soft-pegged to the U.S. dollar and is collateralized by a mix of other cryptocurrencies that are deposited into smart-contract vaults every time new DAI is minted.

zh.description: DAI 是基于以太坊的稳定币，由 Maker Protocol 和 MakerDAO 发行和管理。DAI 的价格是锚定美元的，并且是由多种加密货币作为抵押品存入智能合约机枪池来铸造而成的。

hi.description: DAI एक एथेरियम-आधारित स्थिर मुद्रा है जिसका जारी करना और विकास Maker प्रोटोकॉल और MakerDAO द्वारा प्रबंधित किया जाता है। DAI की कीमत अमेरिकी डॉलर के मुकाबले सॉफ्ट-पेग्ड है और अन्य क्रिप्टोकरेंसी के मिश्रण से संपार्श्विक है जो हर बार नए DAI का खनन होने पर स्मार्ट-कॉन्ट्रैक्ट वॉल्ट में जमा किए जाते हैं।
